document_notes.text:
This update rebuilds missing kernel modules (KMP) to use 'retpolines'
mitigations for Spectre Variant 2 (CVE-2017-5715).

Rebuilt KMP packages:

- cluster-network
- drbd
- gfs2
- iscsitarget
- ocfs2
- ofed
- oracleasm
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirect branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
